verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> [T'al-upon הַגִּתִּ֑ית <S%H1665><s%> hag-git-Tit; upon Gittith לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> liv-nei- for the sons קֹ֥רַח <S%H7141><s%> Ko-rach of Korah מִזְמֽוֹר׃ <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor. A Psalm מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> mah- How יְּדִיד֥וֹת <S%H3039><s%> ye-di-Dot How amiable מִשְׁכְּנוֹתֶ֗יךָ <S%H4908><s%> mish-ke-no-Tei-cha, [are] thy tabernacles יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD צְבָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot. of hosts

נִכְסְפָ֬ה <S%H3700><s%> nich-se-Fah longeth וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- and even כָּלְתָ֨ה׀ <S%H3615><s%> kal-Tah yea even fainteth נַפְשִׁי֮ <S%H5315><s%> naf-Shi My soul לְחַצְר֪וֹת <S%H2691><s%> le-chatz-Rot for the courts יְה֫וָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לִבִּ֥י <S%H3820><s%> lib-Bi my heart וּבְשָׂרִ֑י <S%H1320><s%> u-ve-sa-Ri; and my flesh יְ֝רַנְּנ֗וּ <S%H7442><s%> ye-ran-ne-Nu, crieth out אֶ֣ל <S%H413><s%> 'el about אֵֽל־ <S%H410><s%> 'el- God חָֽי׃ <S%H2416><s%> Chai. for the living

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also צִפּ֨וֹר׀ <S%H6833><s%> tzip-Por Yea the sparrow מָ֪צְאָה <S%H4672><s%> Ma-tze-'ah hath found בַ֡יִת <S%H1004><s%> Va-yit an house וּדְר֤וֹר׀ <S%H1866><s%> u-de-Ror and the swallow קֵ֥ן <S%H7064><s%> ken a nest לָהּ֮ lah אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- where שָׁ֪תָה <S%H7896><s%> Sha-tah for herself where she may lay אֶפְרֹ֫חֶ֥יהָ <S%H667><s%> 'ef-Ro-Chei-ha her young אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִ֭זְבְּחוֹתֶיךָ <S%H4196><s%> Miz-be-cho-tei-cha [even] thine altars יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot; of hosts מַ֝לְכִּ֗י <S%H4428><s%> mal-Ki, my King וֵאלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Hai. and my God

אַ֭שְׁרֵי <S%H835><s%> 'Ash-rei Blessed יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> yo-she-Vei [are] they that dwell בֵיתֶ֑ךָ <S%H1004><s%> vei-Te-cha; in thy house ע֝֗וֹד <S%H5750><s%> od, are ever יְֽהַלְל֥וּךָ <S%H1984><s%> ye-hal-Lu-cha they will be still praising סֶּֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. thee Selah

אַשְׁרֵ֣י <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei Blessed אָ֭דָם <S%H120><s%> 'A-dom [is] the man עֽוֹז־ <S%H5797><s%> 'oz- whose strength ל֥וֹ lo בָ֑ךְ Vach; מְ֝סִלּ֗וֹת <S%H4546><s%> me-sil-Lot, [are] the ways בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ <S%H3824><s%> bil-va-Vam. [is] in thee in whose heart

עֹבְרֵ֤י׀ <S%H5674><s%> 'oe-Rei [Who] passing בְּעֵ֣מֶק <S%H6010><s%> be-'E-mek through the valley הַ֭בָּכָא <S%H1056><s%> Hab-ba-cha of Baca מַעְיָ֣ן <S%H4599><s%> ma'-Yan it a well יְשִׁית֑וּהוּ <S%H7896><s%> ye-shi-Tu-hu; make גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- also בְּ֝רָכ֗וֹת <S%H1293><s%> be-ra-Chot, the pools יַעְטֶ֥ה <S%H5844><s%> ya'-Teh also filleth מוֹרֶֽה׃ <S%H4175><s%> mo-Reh. the rain

יֵ֭לְכוּ <S%H1980><s%> Ye-le-chu go מֵחַ֣יִל <S%H2428><s%> me-Cha-yil from strength אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- before חָ֑יִל <S%H2428><s%> Cha-yil; to strength יֵרָאֶ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> ye-ra-'Eh appeareth אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- before אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him before God בְּצִיּֽוֹן׃ <S%H6726><s%> be-tzi-Yon. [every one of them] in Zion

יְה֘וָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God צְ֭בָאוֹת <S%H6635><s%> Tze-va-'ot of hosts שִׁמְעָ֣ה <S%H8085><s%> shim-'Ah hear תְפִלָּתִ֑י <S%H8605><s%> te-fil-la-Ti; my prayer הַאֲזִ֨ינָה <S%H238><s%> ha-'a-Zi-nah give ear אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei O God יַעֲקֹ֣ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko of Jacob סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

מָ֭גִנֵּנוּ <S%H4043><s%> Ma-gin-ne-nu our shield רְאֵ֣ה <S%H7200><s%> re-'Eh Behold אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; O God וְ֝הַבֵּ֗ט <S%H5027><s%> ve-hab-Bet, and look פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei upon the face מְשִׁיחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H4899><s%> me-shi-Che-cha. of thine anointed

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki for טֽוֹב־ <S%H2896><s%> tov- [is] better י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Yom For a day בַּחֲצֵרֶ֗יךָ <S%H2691><s%> ba-cha-tze-Rei-cha, in thy courts מֵ֫אָ֥לֶף <S%H505><s%> me-'A-lef than a thousand בָּחַ֗רְתִּי <S%H977><s%> ba-Char-ti, I had rather הִ֭סְתּוֹפֵף <S%H5605><s%> His-to-fef be a doorkeeper בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house אֱלֹהַ֑י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai; of my God מִ֝דּ֗וּר <S%H1752><s%> mid-Dur, than to dwell בְּאָהֳלֵי־ <S%H168><s%> be-'o-ho-lei- in the tents רֶֽשַׁע׃ <S%H7562><s%> Re-sha'. of wickedness

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki is a שֶׁ֨מֶשׁ׀ <S%H8121><s%> She-mesh [is] a sun וּמָגֵן֮ <S%H4043><s%> u-ma-Gen and shield יְהוָ֪ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh For the LORD אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him God חֵ֣ן <S%H2580><s%> chen grace וְ֭כָבוֹד <S%H3519><s%> Ve-cha-Vod and glory יִתֵּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> yit-Ten will give יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo No יִמְנַע־ <S%H4513><s%> yim-na'- [thing] will he withhold ט֝֗וֹב <S%H2896><s%> Tov, no good לַֽהֹלְכִ֥ים <S%H1980><s%> la-ho-le-Chim from them that walk בְּתָמִֽים׃ <S%H8549><s%> be-ta-Mim. uprightly

יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh O LORD צְבָא֑וֹת <S%H6635><s%> tze-va-'ot; of hosts אַֽשְׁרֵ֥י <S%H835><s%> 'ash-Rei blessed אָ֝דָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> 'a-Dam, [is] the man בֹּטֵ֥חַ <S%H982><s%> bo-Te-ach that trusteth בָּֽךְ׃ Bach.
